title: When will OCE grow, or overcome certian points.
body:
1. Teamwork or lack of
2. Bitterness and griefing
3. Being a bunch of privileged snowflakes
4. Getting help from higher elo friends because they cant carry themselves.


Be constructive? nope. its classed as toxic.
passive aggressive remarks and silent griefing are the norm.
People have some sort of satisfaction watching team mates fail then actually winning the game. If a person is 1/6 and another is 3/1, that 1/6 player will go out of their way to ensure you end up just as bad in KDA.  What a sad state to play this game in. so vindictive.


I've had the privilege of playing on NA for decent part of last year and its a much better experience, a person can absolutely despise you. but will still be a teamplayer and try to win the game or gain an advantage in the match.

On OCE the mindset is very selfish and closed minded.

Flame me or whatever for the post. but its how i see OCE.
i wish it wasn't the case but it is.

replies.body: And the rank in AU is a freaking joke. In AU, you can expect players in the "high rank" make low IQ mistake such as using no escape skill champion, solo pushing when need to group and get picked; damage miscalculation even when they play their main.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackwhiteKuma,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=P4j0PGrx,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-02-02T18:54:31.847+0000)
>
> And the rank in AU is a freaking joke. In AU, you can expect players in the "high rank" make low IQ mistake such as using no escape skill champion, solo pushing when need to group and get picked; damage miscalculation even when they play their main.

What is AU? Australia? No such server bro.
We play on OCE, which is a region, not a single country.

And rank is such a joke. I'm unranked 4 lyf, since season 2.
I just played an ARAM full of plats and diamonds, and I carried it on a toaster PC with 20 fps.
I love oce, it's not toxic at all what are you talking about ;)

It would be nice to create an account on the Korean server, but unfortunately they require some sort of SSN. Playing with those that have a brain and are trying to win (even if they are losing lane) would be more enjoyable.

You are talking about the place after what? 8 years now? After 8 years, even after 8 years, can not pull out a full functional team to go to the worlds and you meet player in the game, getting 0/3 in the first 10 mins and saying "Yo, I am in Plat, so no matter how bad I did in this game, my teammates must be dumb."
